languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, все, чем он может с вами поделиться — длинный список зараз. Не желаете ли надеть респиратор?" {n}Сенешаль и впрямь извлекает из подсумка маску, отделанную золотом.{/n}
"Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, все, чем он может с вами поделиться — длинный список зараз. Не желаете ли надеть респиратор?" {n}Сенешаль и впрямь извлекает из подсумка маску, отделанную золотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he can share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. Perhaps you would like to put on a breathing mask?" {n}The Seneschal produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

"Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, lo único que puede compartir con usted es una larga lista de enfermedades infecciosas. ¿Puedo ofrecerle una máscara respiradora?». {n}Abelard saca una máscara real con incrustaciones de oro de su bolsa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, lo único que puede compartir con usted es una larga lista de enfermedades infecciosas. ¿Puedo ofrecerle una máscara respiradora?». {n}Abelard saca una máscara real con incrustaciones de oro de su bolsa.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こいつがあなたと分かち合えるのは、感染症の長いリストだけです。呼吸マスクをお渡ししましょうか？」{n}アベラルドがポーチから金がちりばめられたマスクを取り出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こいつがあなたと分かち合えるのは、感染症の長いリストだけです。呼吸マスクをお渡ししましょうか？」{n}アベラルドがポーチから金がちりばめられたマスクを取り出す。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，他唯一能分享给您的东西，就是各种各样的传染性疾病。可以让我给您拿个呼吸面罩来吗？”{n}阿贝拉德从口袋里取出一个面具，上面镶嵌着真正的黄金。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，他唯一能分享给您的东西，就是各种各样的传染性疾病。可以让我给您拿个呼吸面罩来吗？”{n}阿贝拉德从口袋里取出一个面具，上面镶嵌着真正的黄金。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, das Einzige, was er mit Euch teilen kann, ist eine lange Liste ansteckender Krankheiten. Darf ich Euch eine Atemmaske anbieten?" {n}Abelard holt tatsächlich eine goldverzierte Maske aus seinem Beutel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, das Einzige, was er mit Euch teilen kann, ist eine lange Liste ansteckender Krankheiten. Darf ich Euch eine Atemmaske anbieten?" {n}Abelard holt tatsächlich eine goldverzierte Maske aus seinem Beutel.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, tout ce qu'il a à vous offrir, c'est une liste longue comme le bras de maladies infectieuses. Puis-je vous proposer de porter un masque respiratoire ? » {n}vous demande Abélard en vous présentant un masque incrusté d'or.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, tout ce qu'il a à vous offrir, c'est une liste longue comme le bras de maladies infectieuses. Puis-je vous proposer de porter un masque respiratoire ? » {n}vous demande Abélard en vous présentant un masque incrusté d'or.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu adamın sizinle paylaşabileceği tek şey, uzunca bir bulaşıcı hastalıklar listesi olur Lord Kaptan. Size bir solunum maskesi verebilir miyim?" {n}Abelard, kesesinden gerçek altınla süslenmiş bir maske çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the only thing he has to share with you is a long list of infectious diseases. May I offer you a breathing mask?" {n}Abelard produces an actual gold-encrusted mask from his pouch.{/n}
